revised_title: Macromolecular Organization Changes in Collagen Assemblies in Dogfish Egg Capsule Formation
tldr: The article examines the changes in macromolecular organization of collagen during its secretion in the nidamental gland and formation of the egg capsule wall in the dogfish. The study reveals six distinct liquid crystalline phases of collagen and provides insights into the assembly and modulation of collagen macromolecules in the dogfish gland.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology and Molecular Biology
